entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Breton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
